Package de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.Simple.Mesh

Class FluidMesh

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.Simple.Mesh.FluidMesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class FluidMesh
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
This class draws a fluid. Note that this always has to run on the main thread because it is making draw calls.
Author:
Marius Tuschl
